attributes.action: Save the best Facebook group ever "I'm one of dixon's sperm get me out of here!!!"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For whatever reasons Scott Dixon has decided to drop out of the admin on this group. Vote to save it an if enough people vote the Prime minister will have to pay dixon to continue the group on a full time basis and ultimately save mankind!!!!!!!!!!!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
